title: When do we get out mystery champion?
body: On the thread they said we would be getting our mystery champion on 7/1 which is today or did I get my dates wrong?

replies.body: thats for oceana. on the na and eu it says by the first of july. http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/special-event/last-day-how-unlock-your-mystery-champion
It says by that date so it might come earlier or later they are not sure.
